description: This file contains integration tests for the agent's tool usage, including synchronous and asynchronous scenarios, multiple tool calls, and custom tool functions, specifically testing the interaction with tools like YFinanceTools, DuckDuckGoTools, and custom tools within the agno framework.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool usage with YFinanceTools to fetch current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and tool call detection during tool usage.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool usage with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool usage with YFinanceTools.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls with different tools and instructions.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function without parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests tool call with list parameters and multiple tools.
